rename_folder_prompt: Enter new name for the folder:
create_folder_prompt: Enter a name for the new folder:
settings_shortcut_description: Use modifiers like Ctrl, Alt, Shift + a key (e.g., Alt+S).
settings_apps_library_basic_only_hint: Show only everyday applications. Disable to include diagnostics and developer utilities.
auto_instructions_p1: Automations allow you to run commands or open applications using a short keyword.
auto_instructions_step1: Name: A descriptive name for your automation (e.g., "Open Downloads Folder").
auto_instructions_step2: Keyword: A short trigger word (e.g., "dl"). When you type this in the search, the automation will appear.
auto_instructions_step3: Command/Path: The command to execute. This can be a path to a file/folder (e.g., C:\Users\YourUser\Downloads), a URL (e.g., https://google.com), or a system command (e.g., `cmd /c "shutdown /s /t 0"` to shutdown the PC).
wiki_disambiguation_prefix: The query "%s" is ambiguous. Please refine it or use the web search.
wiki_no_summary: No quick summary is available for "%s". Please try the full article or a web search.
error_shortcut_message: Could not register the shortcut '%s'. It might be in use by another application or in an invalid format.
error_shortcut_format: The shortcut format '%s' is invalid. Please use modifiers like Ctrl, Alt, Shift, etc. (e.g., 'Alt+Space').
drag_drop_hint: Drag an app into the Apps window to add it to a folder
subscription_trial_message: Your add-on tools stay unlocked while the subscription is active.
subscription_lab_description: Use the Add-on Lab tab to combine building blocks and tailor FlashSearch to your workflow.
addons_active_description: These add-ons are currently plugged into FlashSearch.
addons_gallery_description: Start with a ready-made module and adapt it to your workflow.
addon_builder_intro: Build features from easy blocks—no coding required.
addon_builder_empty_state: Add blocks to design how your add-on should behave.
addon_builder_error_name_required: Please enter a name for your add-on.
addon_base_clipboard_desc: Start from the classic clipboard layout.
addon_builder_blocks_clipboard_filter_de: Keep only snippets that match keywords or formats.
addon_builder_blocks_text_replace_desc: Swap words or phrases on the fly before they appear.
addon_builder_blocks_pin_items_desc: Keep important entries at the top of the list.
addon_builder_blocks_sync_desc: Share this add-on's data across your devices.
addon_library_clipboard_description: Remember your recent copies with powerful filters.
addon_library_note_description: Capture instant notes and templates beside search.
addon_library_command_description: Queue commands and scripts with one tap.
addon_delete_custom_confirm: Delete this custom add-on? This action cannot be undone.
quick_actions_bridge_description: Curate the buttons beside the search bar and launch the studio for deeper customization.
quick_actions_bridge_body: Use the Quick App Studio to assemble flows visually. Activate or remove quick actions to keep your workspace focused.
quick_actions_bridge_point1: Toggle which default tools appear next to search.
quick_actions_bridge_point2: Promote your custom automations to instant-launch buttons.
quick_actions_bridge_point3: Share blueprints with teammates via export files.
quick_action_manager_subtitle: Enable, arrange, and personalize the buttons that live beside search.
quick_action_manager_active_hint: Drag to reorder. Click the minus icon to remove an item.
quick_action_manager_available_hint: Toggle to add an item to the quick bar.
quick_action_missing: This quick action is no longer available.
quick_action_execution_error: Something went wrong while running that quick action.
quick_action_delete_confirm: Delete this quick action? This cannot be undone.
quick_action_no_selection: Select a quick action to view its details.
quick_action_apps_description: Browse the apps library and organize your favorites.
quick_action_files_description: Jump straight into recent files and folders.
quick_action_clipboard_description: Review and reuse recently copied snippets.
quick_action_focus_description: Toggle distractions off across your workspace.
quick_action_studio_description: Open the visual builder to design automations.
quick_blueprint_lead_description: Qualify spreadsheet leads and alert the right channel.
quick_blueprint_briefing_description: Compile weather, tasks, and email a daily summary.
quick_blueprint_calendar_description: Score ideas and auto-schedule social posts.
quick_module_trigger_manual_description: Start the workflow manually from the quick action.
quick_module_trigger_schedule_descriptio: Run on a repeated schedule using cron.
quick_module_trigger_sheets_description: Watch a spreadsheet for new or updated rows.
quick_module_trigger_webhook_description: Accept HTTP requests to fire the workflow.
quick_module_action_format_description: Clean and format text with templates.
quick_module_action_combine_description: Merge inputs into a single message.
quick_module_logic_score_description: Apply weighted scoring rules to data.
quick_module_logic_delay_description: Pause execution for a set duration.
quick_module_integration_slack_descripti: Send a formatted message to Slack.
quick_module_integration_email_descripti: Deliver an email using your configured account.
quick_module_integration_tasks_descripti: Create or update items in your task list.
quick_module_integration_notion_descript: Read and write pages inside Notion.
quick_app_default_description: Describe what this quick app should do.
quick_app_builder_no_nodes: Add at least one module to continue.
quick_app_inspector_empty: Select a node to edit its settings.
quick_app_inspector_hint: Drag modules into the canvas to start designing your automation.
quick_app_inspector_ports_hint: Inputs accept data from previous steps. Outputs pass results forward.
quick_actions_help_layout_body: The quick bar sits to the right of the global search field. Each button can launch an app, toggle a panel, or run a full automation.
quick_actions_help_builder_body: Quick App Studio offers drag-and-drop modules, responsive zoom, branching conditions, and live testing. Save your blueprint to instantly spawn a button.
quick_actions_help_tip1: Group related actions by colour and emoji for faster recognition.
quick_actions_help_tip2: Use the timeline to trace automation runs before publishing.
quick_actions_help_tip3: Export blueprints to share quick apps with your organisation.
